column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The food
column2: the coffee and the staff are great
column3: but watch where and when you park. I had dinner here Friday night with a good friend that I was catching up with. We were in the middle of a conversation when we were asked to leave at close. We walked across the street
column4: so we could continue talking. When we walked back to our cars
column5: they were gone! We were confused for a minute until we realized we had been towed. What was supposed to be a relaxing evening for both of us ended up being very expensive and stressful as we got our cars out of impound
column7: in a bad part of town. For those of you like me who may not know the area
column8: I wanted to warn to be careful where you park - and make sure you move your car after close.
